Integration of UT network (Ukraine) in EIDA
===========================================

* Data integration grant 2023/24 to **Subbotin Institute of Geophysics of National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine** - project “*Integration in EIDA of continuous real-time open seismological waveform data and associated station/site metadata for stations of the Ukrainian seismic network*”

Summary report: https://polybox.ethz.ch/index.php/s/HshAKN8OIkiJ0vw

Stations: https://eida-sc3.infp.ro/fdsnws/station/1/query?network=UT&nodata=404
